text: Ni$ jehlen wid innan: "Oebbi, s tidep, d lmasie, mmi s n Meryem". Ini: "anwa isaan kra n lkwelf, s$uo Oebbi, ma ihwa yaS ad Ine$ lmasie, mmi s n Meryem, imma s, akked wayen akw illan di tmurt"? N Oebbi tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ixelleq ayen i S ihwan. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
